title: Best of the Program | Guest: Amir Tsarfati | 1/25/22
description:
President Biden was caught on a hot mic insulting a Fox News reporter, but this is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to Biden’s temper. Founder and president of “Behold Israel” Amir Tsarfati joins Glenn to discuss his book, “Operation Joktan,” and what we can learn from the end-time biblical prophecies.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
